name: SnowDaze
description:
Snowdaze is an exploration RPG where you take the role of Todd, a young boy seemingly put into this world through odd circumstances. Though he might be somewhere new, there are plenty of new friends just waiting to meet him!

This is the first game I've released and I'm hoping to improve with every new release and every new update.

Interesting facts and trivia:

I made this while being in a play.. So I was acting and coding and acting and coding and etc

Try to interact with as many things as possible using the Z key!

Many new and interesting secrets to be discovered within!

I started development on SnowDaze in Early October.

This game was a collaboration between   J "Psoriasis" Shiver , Myself and My mother who helped me on the home stretch of the project.
